data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BPFgP4TAvkUAb6UFWgy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBhcrtRvzzp5Xf52i53Qxf1xlpxBI1Du2a3x_3S4AVpgg&oe=66361C9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031471_450514160975639_7876978019992583284_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iFHC7aPReqgAb7UWArm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBpfZkgH2dVry6_mxUTlYI3r874FMiyKPPX2OewJ7oc9Q&oe=6635FC8C)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210396_1168100270905037_6056515960548689783_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-EnENSjWe98Ab4BVZoR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDVKvTCcYq9dXx8Qn1sZZ76MRgcGBr18mXN2Y_7mVCSKg&oe=66360224)
Dive into a breathtaking experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.
![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035438_923857099517367_6431578607880239089_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tVZzCPxOSl0Ab4jQsgK&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDxboQ8vrHJK0MtCt_B9V-t7TaZusoG0cC2yluWXVx16Q&oe=6635FC93)


![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=G224ncrapKMAb7oERKq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDSJZednmMqqfxjkV98pyDuXUXW-ztK8kJcFOwBZqBIMw&oe=66362CD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75203621_1096186291686785_6399755611667254557_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QbCiU3hbc-YAb73j8GB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfA5d8mzFsYa7zkEyOaBfd9zCCbTUSdzqdfT91mVW2dOJw&oe=6635FA95)

![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BGlrU1wVR6cAb4xvQs4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBJbJGMRo3Vr_QQOw6PCIeJHSKE2Lry9OP1SqEWqNJozw&oe=66360F70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295893_804268758252860_8856952948920548753_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Frto-g2UdY4Ab6fbT0N&_nc_oc=AdjkYwvA0DlS6-_hLI-lPYcF5QDDccHivIf5ZV5RMCiRdrRZqFnHeHst4wFjINkw528&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfD_PbzXRVZiny-65K-tOmtxXsnL7MPZaqqUXho_CVhXLw&oe=663624EB)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lrqJTkCAtVAAb6r7Vf_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCem2zHgHCJTOUMZa7S-u2vjzPdt1Q-44tPfZElmhLtsA&oe=66360D97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë





![{"height":702,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982658_417699267880520_1132379095717972405_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KP_V-QLICCYAb7QK0Gp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBm2xQrLdIn3EWk5LFPLSSVW9dXT5HgJOUXiTRjborRkQ&oe=6635F851)
